MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA12 postcode area of Irvine, affecting properties in Harbour street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.07am. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:26am on Wednesday, 10 February 2021
